meanings.definition: A literary work that continues the story of a previous work.
meanings.sent1: The sequels to the famous book were eagerly awaited by readers.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy reading sequels because they let me see what happens next in the story.
meanings.sent3: The sequels to the novel were like getting letters from old friends.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a series of sequels, each chapter building on the last.
meanings.sent5: The sequels brought the characters back to life in my imagination.

meanings.sent1: After the party, the sequels included cleaning up and saying goodbye to guests.
meanings.sent2: The sequels to the meeting involved follow-up emails and setting up another appointment.
meanings.sent3: The sequels to the movie night were deciding on the next film to watch.
meanings.sent4: His decision to quit his job had many sequels, including finding a new career path.
meanings.sent5: The sequels to the game night were planning the next gathering with friends.
